title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Analyze the basic principles of rocket propulsion and provide a detailed report on the different types of rocket engines and their applications.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Submit a detailed analysis of combustion processes in rocket engines, including fuel types, efficiency calculations, and combustion instability factors.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design a rocket nozzle optimized for a given set of mission parameters. Include CAD drawings and performance analysis.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Complete the aerodynamics quiz covering fundamental concepts of fluid dynamics, Bernoulli's principle, and airflow behavior.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Perform a detailed flow analysis comparing subsonic and supersonic flow characteristics using the provided wind tunnel data.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Analyze aerodynamic heating during atmospheric reentry and propose a thermal protection system for a given spacecraft configuration.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a spacecraft structural component using appropriate materials. Include stress analysis and a justification for material selection.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate orbital transfer parameters for a mission from low Earth orbit to geostationary orbit. Include delta-v budgets and transfer times.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Comprehensive exam covering spacecraft systems engineering, including power systems, communication subsystems, and thermal control.
